p: Ribavirin is an approved drug developed to treat HCV and especially children hospitalized for the treatment of the respiratory syncytial virus (RSV). According to Kim et al. [ 113] in vivo studies performed with combinations of lopinavir/ribavirin (LPV/r), Ribavirin and interferon resulted in the cure of a 64-year-old MERS patient from Korea after 6 days of treatment. In addition, the combination of LPV/r and interferon was also included in a study for a randomized control in Saudi Arabia to MERS patients [ 114].
